definition: showing no care or concern in attitude or action
details:
adjective
- showing no care or concern in attitude or action
= example: showing no care or concern in attitude or action
- (often followed by `to') lacking importance
= synonyms: immaterial
- marked by a lack of interest
= synonyms: apathetic
- neither too great nor too little
= example: neither too great nor too little
- being neither good nor bad
= example: being neither good nor bad
= synonyms: so-so
- characterized by a lack of partiality
= example: characterized by a lack of partiality
= synonyms: unbiased, unbiassed
- marked by no especial liking or dislike or preference for one thing over another
= example: marked by no especial liking or dislike or preference for one thing over another
- having only a limited ability to react chemically
= synonyms: inert
- fairly poor to not very good
= example: fairly poor to not very good
- (usually followed by `to') unwilling or refusing to pay heed
= synonyms: deaf
